attributes.action: Rectify the fact that Scotland and Scots are being, victimised, penalised and paying a cost when having to change Scottish currency into English currency in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scotland and her people are being penalised when they are having to change Scottish notes for English ones. The valuation of sterling was only different before the act of Union in 1707, so why are Scotland and her people being victimised when they when  they travel into England and Scots notes are not excepted as part of UK currency or when they have to change to Scots into English currency they get charged a fee . We are supposed to be part of the United Kingdoms this should not be the case, not unless Scotland is given the right to start charging and not excepting English currency in Scotland. This contravenes the laws of the Act of Union of 1707.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
